product_name: Native Eyewear Lodo Polarized Sunglasses - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With a name that nods to sunny Denver's lower downtown neighborhood, the Native Lodo polarized sunglasses protect your eyes in summer and winter, from the direct sun to the glare off a snowy slope. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Sahara Snow frames feature polarized copper lenses that are ideal for moderate sunlight. Maple Tort frames feature polarized brown lenses that are ideal for bright sunlight. Iron frames feature polarized gray lenses and are ideal for extremely bright sunlight. Lightweight frames are flexible and durable enough to withstand high-velocity collisions; they also endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Snap-Back(TM) Interchange lens system lets you switch lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities; additional lenses not included. Nonslip nose pads; cam-action hinges; soft protective pouch included that doubles as a cleaning cloth. The Native Eyewear Lodo polarized sunglasses are sized to best fit medium profiles. Closeout.
short_description: With a name that nods to sunny Denver's lower downtown neighborhood, the Native Lodo polarized sunglasses protect your eyes in summer and winter, from the direct sun to the glare off a snowy slope.
